# Setup

```{r setup}
require(devtools)
require(ggplot2)
require(annmatrix)
require(ggplotify)
require(patchwork)
require(parallel)
require(data.table)
require(stringr)
require(CVXR)
source('plotConfig.R')
load_all()
```

# Run solver
```{r run-solver}
require(devtools)
require(ggplot2)
require(annmatrix)
require(ggplotify)
require(patchwork)
require(parallel)
require(data.table)
require(stringr)
require(CVXR)
source('plotConfig.R')
load_all()
control=list(
  Nmeas=24,
  Nfine=144,
  Nfreq=2^4,
  fmin=1,
  fmax=24,
  PreSolve=2,
  MIPFocus=3,
  cvxr_verbose=T,
  time_limit=5,
  maxit=1e9,
  MIPGapAbs=.01,
  NodefileStart=Inf 
)
res=solve_cvxr(control,cfuntype='ncp')
ggplot()+geom_point(aes(x=res$mtvalue,y=1))+xlim(c(0,1))
```
